QuestData.Title: Southsea Freebooters
QuestData.Description: Gazlowe promised me a promotion if I can help him with Ratchet's pirate issues. The problem is these new buccaneers that sailed in and took over Fray Island, south of here. They're not just after our goods - they've got grudges to settle! The other night they even went after one of our war galleons.$B$BI've got plans in the works to deal with the situation, but Gazlowe wants to see quick results. Head over to Fray Island and start lopping off some heads, will you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Southsea Cutthroats or Privateers on Fray Island.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you swash some buckles, $n? Did you Buccan their neers?
QuestData.RewardText: Superb! Gazlowe will reward me handsomely for this. And I'll reward you. Less handsomely, of course. A goblin's got to make a living, you know?
